results.title: Mister Roberts
results.creator_credit: Warner Bros Pictures, Leland Hayward, John Ford and Mervyn LeRoy
results.brief_description: Hailed by critics as a classic of the American cinema, “Mister Roberts” is an adaptation of the smash hit Broadway play about life on a small naval cargo ship floating ‘somewhere between the Islands of Tedium and Ennui’ in the Pacific Ocean during World War II. Fonda is outstanding as the gentle cargo officer who protects his men from the shop’s tyrannical captain, played by James Cagney. Also in the cast is Jack Lemmon in his Academy Award winning role as Ensign Pulver and William Powell as Doc Daneeka.

results.title: Mister Prime Minister: Robert Gordon Menzies
results.brief_description: Documents the life and political career of Sir Robert Menzies, Prime Minister of Australia during 1939-1941 and 1949-1966, shown in contemporary film scenes. Suitable for secondary level.

results.title: Mister Prime Minister: Joseph Benedict Chifley
results.creator_credit: Australian Broadcasting Commission and Tom Haydon
results.brief_description: The life and political career of J.B. Chifley, Prime Minister of Australia 1945-1949. Covers his early life and rise through the ranks of the ALP; notes the record amount of legislation passed furing his term of office, and presents interviews with associates. Narrated by Roger Climpson. Suitable for secondary level.

results.title: Mister prime minister: Alfred Deakin
results.brief_description: Provides an overview of Deakin’s life from his birth in a northern inner suburb of Melbourne in 1856 to his death in 1919, and closely examines his involvement in the Federation movement and his dominance of the first decade of Federal politics. Narrated by Roger Climpson.

results.title: Misson to Mars
results.creator_credit: Touchstone Pictures, Tom Jacobson and Brian De Palma
results.brief_description: The year is 2020 and the first manned mission to Mars, commanded by Luke Graham, lands safely on the red planet. But the Martian landscape harbours a bizarre and shocking secret that leads to a mysterious disaster so catastrophic, it decimates the crew. Haunted by a cryptic last message from Graham, NASA launches the Mars Recovery Mission to investigate and bring back survivors - if there are any. Features: Gary Sinise, Don Cheadle, and Tim Robbins. Music by Ennio Morricone.

results.title: Mississippi River: trade route of Mid-America
results.creator_credit: Bailey Film Productions, Justin Byers and Geraldine Byers
results.brief_description: The Mississippi River is the longest and most important river in America. It shaped the history of the continent and the lives of the people who live in its vicinity today. Animated diagrams are used to show its geographical and industrial importance, and the levee system of control of the river is discussed at some length. Various rural and urban industries follow the path of the great Mississippi River.

results.title: Mississippi masala [DVD]
results.creator_credit: SCS Films, Film Four International, Michael Nozik and Mira Nair
results.brief_description: A refreshingly tender film about race relations in the United States that manages to be both intelligent and complex. Mina (Roshan Seth) is an Indian woman whose family fled Uganda during the rule of Idi Amin. She falls in love with Demetrius (Denzel Washington), an African-American who is challenged by the traditions of her Indian background. She in turn has to fight against her family’s fears and racism. Without histrionics this film paints a picture of small-town Americana that is rich and diverse. A wonderful comic love story with excellent performances.
